Battera::
She swallowed hard. She had to steady her voice to make this sound 
good. "Sure thing. That bot won't know what hit him."

She had to think how to accomplish getting blackstorm into the hands 
of the maximals while not blowing her cover while trying  to make a 
plan and tell WHeeljack-X about the situation. For one, she truely 
thought the Matrix hated her.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> "1.. a wide patrol around a certain area. No one is to go beyond a 
certain 
> point. NO ONE. Understood?"
> 
> "2ndly... I need the Autobot Whelljack-X. He supposely has 
something I want. 
> Battera if you could get Wheeljack for me. Blackstorm... you can 
patrol." 
> 
> Soon enough she came to a hover & faced the 2 other fembots. "I 
want NO ONE 
> to come further than this point.... in a radius. If anyone does 
slip by, 
> inform me immediately! I will guarantee that they will be met with 
a very 
> terminal surprize!" her crimson optics glowed. She was not kidding. 
This 
> secret she had.. she wanted it hidden from the others. She would 
honestly be 
> surprized if Rodimus didn't know this secret as well.
